hero.subtitle: Hi, I'm Alex
hero.description3: specialized in building pixel perfect interactive websites/applications.

about.title: About me
about.description1: Hi there! Welcome to my website. I'm a
about.description3: based in Munich, Germany, passionate about solving complex problems and taking on new challenges. I'm happy that you've found my corner of the web.
about.description4: I am disciplined and have a strong logical mindset. People who know me say I'm obsessed and they're probably right, I am driven and love diving into new things.
about.description5: I enjoy solving problems and coming up with creative solutions to turn digital ideas into reality. Programming pushes me every day and keeps me excited about what I do. Check out my projects to see how I bring it all together.

skills.title: My skills
skills.description: I have grown my frontend developments skills that have allowed me to create different real projects.

featured.subtitle: Featured Project
featured.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

contact.title: Get in contact
contact.description1: Contact me through this form. I’d love to hear from you, learn about your ideas, and contribute to your projects with my skills.
contact.checkbox_label3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
